I have known Jay since the mid-80's when we both started our sales careers at CA.  And I have continued to work even closer with Jay over the past 15 years.  Jay is one of those unique individuals who has a firm grasp on emerging technologies, markets, and economic trending coupled with advice that is both astute and forward thinking, that propels him into the "subject matter expert" category, who is poised for the new era in technology.  If you are looking for the consummate professional, who is articulate and results oriented, that can bring value to your organization as far as human capital management/placement, look no further. I have dealt with Jay from both sides of the fence, as a hiring manager and as a candidate, and I would absolutely use Jay in the future from either perspective. This man rocks! ;)

summary: Wikipedia Writer l Wikipedia Editor  l Wikipedia Page Creation l Wikipedia Updating I Wikipedia Consulting I Wikipedia Editing I WikiExpert l Wikipedia Monitoring lWe create new and optimize existing Wikipedia articles Given Wikipedia's domain authority, it is a crucial component of any serious marketing strategy.Why WikiCreators.com:✦Our projects include a Logo, InfoBox and are always Google Knowledge Graph friendly✦Fixed Project Pricing✦Google Knowledge Graph Integration☎ (954) 346-2788 ✉ js@wikicreators.com Skype: Wiki Creators✦ WikiCreators specializes in Wikipedia writing, updating and monitoring Wikipedia pages for notable individuals and businesses while navigating the complex world of Wikipedia’s stringent guidelines.✦ WikiCreators is a team of Wikipedia experts with years of experience in Wikipedia research, Wikipedia editing,  Wikipedia writing and article submission. We offer clients the full-service Wikipedia experience, from determining a subject’s notability to  research to writing, formatting, translating, image management and ensuring an article’s approval toWikipedia. We guarantee a notable subject’s successful page approval and take pride in providing a high-quality serviceWikiCreators maximizes our clients' online visibility by creating  new and optimizing existing Wikipedia articlesWikipedia gets more online traffic than nearly any social media platform. Wikipedia is the seventh most visited page on the Internet. It is accessed worldwide nearly 3,000 times per second and is one of the most viewed websites on the internet with over 400 million unique users each month. Due to Wikipedia’s high domain authority (100) when searching for any topic, business or person, Wikipedia is typically the top result in nearly every search. Wikipedia boasts more than 5 million articles and growing.
